TRAIT 1: Formation
TRAIT 2: Thrall: 2 of these units are worth 1 unit slot. Can be activated two at a time.
ABILITY 1: OL45: Attack, range 2-3, reload. On hit: 1 damage, ignoring armor. Headshot: inflict 1 vulnerable.
ABILITY 2: Baton: Push, melee. Effect: Push 1.
SPECIAL 1: Brace: While in cover, attacks gain +1 max range.
SPECIAL 2: Tactical Reload: Gain Headshot: reload and gain 1 strength.
SPECIAL 3: Scavenge Ammo: May consume one adjacent corpse before or after ACTing to reload and gain 1 strength.

TRAIT 1: Formation
ABILITY 1: Skull Crack: Attack, melee, push. On hit: 2 damage and push 1. Headshot: push 2.
ABILITY 2: Flashbang: Range 3, reload, splash. Effect: 1 fire damage and 1 vulnerable, then Splash (target): push 1 away from target.
ABILITY 3: Shieldwall: Self. Effect: Until start of this unit's next turn, this unit cannot MOVE, step, or be pushed or pulled, gains cover, and grants cover to adjacent allies from all directions.
SPECIAL 1: Shield Charge: Unit may step 1 before using Skull Crack and it gains splash (self) push foes 1.
SPECIAL 2: Bulwark: Shieldwall also clears up to two negative tokens on self or adjacent allies.
SPECIAL 3: Bone Dust Napalm: Flashbang deals 1 splash fire damage.

TRAIT 1: Formation
ABILITY 1: Regurgitate Ammo: Range 3. Effect: A unit in range reloads and gains one, (5+) or two strength.
ABILITY 2: Bone Shards: Curse, Range 3. Effect: Unit takes 1 curse damage after any ACT ability resolves that pushes or pulls them. Lasts until end of this unit's next turn or until this unit has taken 3 damage this way.
ABILITY 3: Destructive Glee: Self. Effect: Step 1, then Splash (self): 1 fire damage, push 1, and inflict vulnerable, then self is obliterated.
SPECIAL 1: Vomit Bullets: Bone Shards gains effect: (4+) push 1, (6+) push 1 again.
SPECIAL 2: Napalm Injector: Destructive Glee's splash effect gains effect (4+): +1 fire damage, (6+): and +1 vulnerable.
SPECIAL 3: Hot Chamber: Regurgitate Ammo can target two different adjacent units but only grants 1 strength.

TRAIT 1: Formation
ABILITY 1: Snipe: Attack, range 2-4, reload. On hit: 2 damage. Headshot: and inflict 1 vulnerable.
ABILITY 2: Transform to Gun: Self. Effect: Unit becomes unable to MOVE or step, but gains 2 strength and ranged abilities gain +2 maximum range. It can end this effect by sacrificing a MOVE, but if it does, it loses all associated effects, including all strength tokens.
ABILITY 3: Deathmark: Curse, Range 4. Effect: Inflict vulnerable, (4+): 3 vulnerable, (6+): Remove any vitality first.
SPECIAL 1: Claw Pitons: Transform to Gun makes the unit immune to push and pull.
SPECIAL 2: Extended Barrel: Snipe gains +1D when this unit is in cover and -1D when it is not.
SPECIAL 3: Caliber Up: Snipe gains push 1 and Headshot: push 2.

TRAIT 1: Formation
TRAIT 2: Siege Shield: May be used as a cover object by allies.
ABILITY 1: Juggernaut: Self, push. Effect: Step 1, then splash (self) push foes 1, (5+) push foes 2. May move into and destroy walls with this step.
ABILITY 2: Mortar: Attack, range 2-4, reload. On hit: 1 damage then Splash: 1 fire damage. Headshot: +1 damage on main target.
ABILITY 3: Catechism Devil Cannon: Line, reload. Effect: Line 5, 1 fire damage, and inflicts 1 vulnerable on the first unit in the line. Pierces through walls and can target through walls.
SPECIAL 1: Fortify: Juggernaut also clears all negative tokens.
SPECIAL 2: Heavy Caliber Cannon: Catechism pushes all units in the line 1 space and destroys all walls.
SPECIAL 3: Gunner Pivot: When at least one ally is adjacent to this unit, Mortar ignores cover.

TRAIT 1: Formation
TRAIT 2: Hot Clip: Reloading grants you 1 strength.

TRAIT 1: Blood Rage
TRAIT 2: Thrall: 2 of these units are worth 1 unit slot. Can be activated two at a time.
ABILITY 1: Charge: Self. Effect: MOVE as far as possible in a straight line, passing through units. Then, units passed through during this movement take 1 damage.

SPECIAL 1: Bladed: At 0 hp, gain retaliation.
SPECIAL 2: Overclocked: At 1 hp or lower, gain free movement.
SPECIAL 3: Lobotomized: Gain Curseproof.

TRAIT 1: Blood Rage
ABILITY 1: Rev: Self. Effect: Gain 1 strength and speed (5+) and retaliation until start of this unit's next turn..
ABILITY 2: Chainsaw: Attack, melee. On hit: 1 damage, Effect: (4+): 1 damage again, (6+): 1 damage again.
ABILITY 3: Wild Slashes: Self. Effect: MOVE as far as possible in a straight line. Then, all units adjacent to any space of this MOVE take 1 fire damage.

SPECIAL 2: Rile: Rev grants one (4+) or two berserk.

TRAIT 1: Blood Rage
ABILITY 1: Pain Frenzy: Curse, Range 3. Effect: Unit gains 2 berserk or 2 speed.
ABILITY 2: Cauterize: Curse, Range 3. Effect: Clear all negative tokens on self or a unit, then deal 1 fire damage to them. This damage can't slay a unit.

SPECIAL 2: Frenzy Hook: At 1 hp or lower, Meat Hook can pull up to three units.

TRAIT 1: Blood Rage
TRAIT 2: Hellwheel: This unit may spend speed tokens as strength. May pass through units but not their turn in their spaces.

SPECIAL 2: Endless Screaming: Spin Out grants 1 berserk per unit damaged.

TRAIT 1: Blood Rage
TRAIT 2: Steaming Rage: When taking damage, gain 1 berserk and 1 strength. This effect can't trigger more than once a round.
ABILITY 1: Pulverize: Self. Effect: Pull all units in range 2 one space toward this unit. Then splash (self): 1 fire damage and destroy all adjacent walls.

ABILITY 3: Rip and Tear: Attack, melee. On hit: 2 damage. Deal 1 damage again if this unit has 3 or less hp, then deal 1 damage again if it is at 1 hp or less.
SPECIAL 1: Machineheart: At 1 hp or lower, gains SUPER.
SPECIAL 2: Fuel Injectors: May step 2 before using Pulverize.
SPECIAL 3: Bifurcate: Rip and Tear obliterates units that it reduces to 0 hp.

TRAIT 1: Blood Rage
TRAIT 2: Fueled by Rage: Gain 1 berserk token at the start of your turn. You may spend berserk tokens as speed tokens.

ABILITY 2: + Choose One More

SPECIAL 2: Glory Kill (3 SOUL): Own or allied turn. Effect: Obliterate an adjacent unit at 1 hp or lower. Gain 2 strength, then step 2.

TRAIT 1: Toxic Revenge: Has Deathburst: Splash (self): 1 plague.
TRAIT 2: Thrall: 2 of these units are worth 1 unit slot. Can be activated two at a time.
ABILITY 1: Psuedopod: Range 2-3. Effect: Pull unit one, (5+) or two spaces.

SPECIAL 2: Tentacle Whip: Pseudopod inflicts 1 slow on plagued units.

TRAIT 1: Plaguebearer: Immune to hazards. May treat plague tokens as strength.
ABILITY 1: Pustulate: Range 3. Effect: Create a hazard in a free space in range 3 (4+) and splash (target): 1 plague (6+): 2 plague.
ABILITY 2: Vomitous Mass: Line 3. Line: 1 plague. Already plagued foes gain 1 slow.

SPECIAL 2: Invigorating Viscera: Gain death burst: splash (self): allies gain 1 strength.
SPECIAL 3: Smog Shroud: Curseproof while standing in a hazard.

TRAIT 1: Deathwash: Has Deathburst: Splash (self): Remove any 1 token from all allies in the area.
ABILITY 1: Suppurate: Curse, Range 3. Effect: Unit permanently gains death burst: splash (self): 1 toxic damage and 1 plague. This effect cannot stack with itself but stacks with other death burst effects.
ABILITY 2: Evolve Strain: Curse, Range 3. Effect: Strip all plague tokens from a unit in range. Foes take 1 toxic damage. Then, they gain 1 slow per token removed. Allies gain 1 strength per token removed.
ABILITY 3: Swell with Corruption: Range 3. Effect: Unit triggers deathburst without being slain.
SPECIAL 1: Massive Swell: Swell with corruption has a 5+ chance to trigger twice.
SPECIAL 2: Spreading Strain: Evolve Strain can spread its tokens as an infect effect centred on its target instead.

TRAIT 1: Swarm Release: Has Deathburst: create a hazard under this unit and in one adjacent free space.
ABILITY 1: Propagate Swarm: Range 4. Effect: Create one, (3+) two, or (5+) three hazards in range. May spend a plague token on self to re-roll the effect die once.
ABILITY 2: Driving Vermin: Attack, Range 2-4. On hit: 1 damage and pull 1. Infect: 1 damage and pull 1.
SPECIAL 1: Swarm Feed: May spend plague tokens on self to grant Driving Vermin +1D per token spent.
SPECIAL 2: Toxic Avenger: Immune to hazards. While standing in a hazard, increase the range of all abilities by +2.
SPECIAL 3: Defiler: Driving Vermin gains effect (5+): create a hazard under target.

TRAIT 1: Vile Rupture: Has Deathburst: Remove up to three plague tokens one this unit, then splash (self): 1 toxic damage, once, per plague token removed.
ABILITY 1: Percolate: Self. Effect: Inflict one, (3+) two, (5+) or three plague tokens on self, then may inflict 1 slow on an adjacent unit per plague token gained.
ABILITY 2: Surge: Self. Effect: MOVE with free movement in a straight line. During this move, is immune to hazards and may move through walls and units. Any foe this unit passes through takes 1 toxic damage and this unit may pass off any plague tokens on this unit to affected units.
SPECIAL 1: Rotten Surge: After Surge, inflict 1 plague on self for each unit passed through.
SPECIAL 2: Sticky Trail: During Surge, may create a hazard in one space passed through.
SPECIAL 3: The Gunk: Surge inflicts 2 slow on the first unit affected.

TRAIT 1: Blessed with Filth: Immune to hazards. At turn start, gain 1 plague, then distribute any number of plague tokens on this unit to any other units in range 2.

SPECIAL 2: Slime Form (3 SOUL): Any Turn. Trigger: Turn start. Effect: MOVE with free movement. Can pass through walls and units during this movement. After the movement finishes, push or pull all units in range 2 one space.

TRAIT 1: Inverted Crucifix: When slain, leaves a space of adverse terrain or (5+) a wall instead of a corpse.

TRAIT 1: Slither: Has free movement while adjacent to a wall.

ABILITY 2: Kidnap: Range 2-4. Effect: Pull 1, ignoring line of sight. If pulling a unit into a wall, pull 3 instead and the kidnapped unit can pass through walls and units during this pull.
ABILITY 3: Serpent's Kiss: Attack, melee. On hit: 1 damage. Effect: Inflicts 1 weak against isolated units (4+) and Dooms them.

TRAIT 1: Teleport: When MOVEing a second time or more in a turn, may instead remove self from the battlefield, then place anywhere in free space in range 4.

TRAIT 1: Soul Sight: Abilities ignore line of sight.

TRAIT 1: Flight: Ignores adverse terrain and elevation attack and movement penalties.

ABILITY 3: Limb from Limb: Attack, Melee. Effect: May step 1 before the attack. If stepping into a wall, destroy the wall and repeat this effect. On hit: 1 damage. For each time the devil smashed a wall before this attack, the target takes +1 damage, up to a maximum of three times.
SPECIAL 1: To the Slaughter: Beckon Lamb has no maximum range against Doomed units.
SPECIAL 2: Death Toll: Omnipresence has a 4+ effect chance to Doom its target if it's a foe.

TRAIT 1: Dread Presence: May move through walls. Isolated units gain -1D on attacks against this unit.

TRAIT 1: Miracle
ABILITY 1: Mea Culpa: Self. Splash (self): Remove one negative token from all allies in range and place them on this unit. Then remove one, (4+) two, or (6+) all negative tokens from this unit, and gain 1 strength for each negative token removed this way.
ABILITY 2: Holy Water: Range 2-3. Effect: 1 holy damage and (5+) create a hazard under target.

TRAIT 1: Miracle

SPECIAL 2: Suffuse: Whirling Chain gains effect (5+): gain 1 vitality and remove a negative token from this unit.

TRAIT 1: Miracle
ABILITY 1: Gentleness: Self. Effect: Become unable to MOVE, step, or be pushed or pulled until start of this unit's next turn. For the duration, allies that end their turn adjacent to this unit gain 1 vitality.

TRAIT 1: Miracle
ABILITY 1: Winch: Self. Effect: Step 1. Next attack from this unit gains +1D and +2 maximum range. This effect stacks.

TRAIT 1: Flight: Ignores adverse terrain and elevation attack and movement penalties.

SPECIAL 2: Holy Font: Ablutions gains Stance (Round 3+): gain 3 vitality instead, Round (5+): gain 4 vitality instead.

TRAIT 1: Holy Vessel: Lacks Miracle. However, while alive, miracle triggers for adjacent allies on a 4+.
ABILITY 1: Starmetal Godsword: Attack, melee. On hit: 1 damage. Stance (Odd): and step 1, Stance (Even): and gain 1 vitality, Stance (Round 5+): Increase damage to 3.

TRAIT 1: Fall to Shambles: When slain, leaves an extra corpse token in an adjacent space (two corpses total).
TRAIT 2: Thrall: 2 of these units are worth 1 unit slot. Can be activated two at a time.
ABILITY 1: Unstable Mutation: Self. Effect: Gain 1 strength, (4+) 1 speed, (5+) and 1 vitality, (6+) and explode for splash (self): 1 damage. Spare parts: Roll +1D per corpse and pick the highest result.
ABILITY 2: Twisting Strike: Attack, Melee. On hit: 1 damage. Effect: Mutate.
SPECIAL 1: Genestealer: Twisting Strike gains Effect (5+): steal a positive token from target.
SPECIAL 2: Spread Mutate: Twisting Strike may cause adjacent allies to mutate instead.

TRAIT 1: Leftovers: Has a 4+ effect chance after MOVEing to drop a corpse in a free adjacent space.
ABILITY 1: Inject Mutagen: Range 3. Effect: One or two units in range mutate. Spare parts: and also dole out 1 strength per corpse consumed.
ABILITY 2: Purge: Curse, Range 3. Effect: A unit in range removes one token of this units choice (3+): two (5+): all.
ABILITY 3: Marriage: Range 2. Effect: Instantly slay self or an allied unit in range. Another allied unit in range gains 2 speed, vitality, and strength, or just 1 if the slain unit was a thrall.
SPECIAL 1: Absorb: May grant one of the tokens stolen by Purge to another unit in range.
SPECIAL 2: Scour Flesh: Purge deals 1 toxic damage to foes.

TRAIT 1: Lope: Has free movement and ignores hazards in spaces occupied by corpses.
ABILITY 1: Bloodgorger: Self. Effect: Mutate, then gain 1 strength. Spare parts: Then gain (3+): 1 speed, (5+) and 1 vitality, (6+) then mutate again. Roll +1D per corpse consumed for the effect.
ABILITY 2: Bloody Slashes: Attack, melee. On hit: 1 damage. Effect: Splash (self): 1 damage.
SPECIAL 1: The Hunger: If starting turn in range 2 of a corpse, may step 2.
SPECIAL 2: Autophagia: At turn start, may deal 1 damage to self, ignoring armor, to generate a corpse in an adjacent space.
SPECIAL 3: Hunch: May use corpses as cover.

TRAIT 1: Flight: Ignores adverse terrain and elevation attack and movement penalties.
ABILITY 1: Regurgitate: Range 2-4. Effect: Splash (target): Create a corpse in the area for every unit in the area, up to three times, then mutate.
ABILITY 2: Sin Eater: Attack, Range 2-4. On hit: 1 damage. Effect: Steal a positive token from target. Spare parts: plus one more token per corpse consumed. If target has no positive tokens, gain 1 strength instead of stealing a token.
SPECIAL 1: Drown in Viscera: Regurgitate has a 5+ effect chance to strip a positive token of your choice from foes in the area.
SPECIAL 2: Rapid Adaptation: May also mutate once for each corpse created with Regurgitate instead.
SPECIAL 3: Cleansing Wash: Regurgitate has a 5+ effect chance to remove a negative token from an ally caught in the area.

TRAIT 1: Warpflesh: Starts combat with 4 mutation tokens.
ABILITY 1: Sculpt Flesh: Self. Effect: Gain 1 strength, OR 1 speed, OR 1 vitality. Spare parts: Repeat this effect once for each corpse consumed.
ABILITY 2: Absorb: Melee. Effect: Deal 1 damage to an adjacent unit. If reduced to 0 hp, obliterates unit and homonculus gains any tokens the absorbed unit had.
ABILITY 3: Flesh Whip: Attack, Range 1-2. On hit: 1 damage and splash (target): 1 damage and (4+) create one (6+) or two corpse tokens in an adjacent space to target.
SPECIAL 1: Ball of Limbs: When choosing to MOVE again, destroys walls and absorbs corpses it moves over, mutating each time.
SPECIAL 2: Meld: When absorbing allies does not obliterate them, and this unit mutates.
SPECIAL 3: Form Carapace: If absorb destroys a unit, gains PHYS for the rest of combat.

TRAIT 1: Polyglot: At turn start, may convert a mutation token into strength, speed, or vitality, then mutate.
ABILITY 1: Experimental Surgery: Line 4. Line: 1 damage. Effect: Allies in the line mutate instead of taking damage.
ABILITY 2: + Choose One More
SPECIAL 1: Wild Mutation (1 SOUL): Own or Allied Turn, Range 4. Trigger: Turn start. Effect: Unit gains 1 strength, (3-4) OR 1 speed, (5-6) OR 1 vitality. Spare Parts: May choose one token per corpse consumed instead of rolling.
SPECIAL 2: Sample Genome (3 SOUL): Own or allied turn. Range 4. Copy all positive tokens on unit, then grant them to another unit in range.
